# Dataset

vamos a utilizar el dataset de 'carros' de vega_dataset https://vega.github.io/vega-datasets/


```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data

```

# Autos

```{python}
cars=data.cars()
cars.head()
```



```{python}
alt.Chart (cars, title= "Viz 1").mark_point().encode(
    alt.X('Miles_per_Gallon'),
    alt.Y('Weight_in_lbs'),
    tooltip=[
        'Miles_per_Gallon',
        'Weight_in_lbs'
    ]
).interactive()
```
